known_issues.title: Transient production deployment errors
known_issues.description: Production publishing can occasionally fail with a generic 'Deployment error' message. This is typically a transient issue caused by network congestion or the previous build not fully finalizing on the Internet Computer network.
known_issues.mitigation: Wait briefly (30-60 seconds) and retry the production publish. The deployment usually succeeds on the second attempt once the network/builder has finalized the previous state.
known_issues.workaround: Retry production publish after a short wait
